text: haey chaur puok anak kom samleab chivit norna mneak del a l laoh ban hamkhat aoy saoh leuklengte mean moulheto troem trauv bonnaoh . haey anaknea del trauv ban ke samleab daoy a you tde-thmr ku pit nasa yeung ban brakl setthi( sangsoek) aoy anak keapear robsa ke . hetonih chaur komaoy ke thveu huosa promden kamnt( robsa a l laoh) nowknong kar samleab vinh aoy saoh . pitabrakd nasa ke( anak keapear) ku trauv ban ke chuoy karpar( daoy chbab ai sla m)
